World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五 16:39:33 GMT 120
Migrant arrivals to Spain's Canaries surge seven-fold so far this yearThe number of migrants boarding rickety boats from West Africa and reaching Spain's Canary Islands has risen seven-fold so far this year from the same period of 2023, Interior Ministry data showed on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:33:02 GMT IZZILYB3LZOTZISVKFCMH2ENBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/migrant-arrivals-spains-canaries-surge-seven-fold-so-far-this-year-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny 'highly likely' was killed-Navalny's alliesAllies of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, Kira Yarmysh and Ivan Zhdanov, said on Friday that Navalny was "highly likely" to have been killed in a penal colony. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:27:13 GMT FBZVB3KCM5J5FO3IFJFEU4AKCI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalny-highly-likely-was-killed-navalnys-allies-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
US VP Harris slams Putin after Navalny death, vows NATO, Ukraine supportU.S. Vice President Kamala Harris said the death of Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny in an Arctic penal colony on Friday, if confirmed, would be a further sign of the brutality of Russian President Vladimir Putin. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:26:17 GMT L5WE6W7VORKL3P6BKN5CKAVEB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-vp-harris-slams-putin-after-navalny-death-vows-nato-ukraine-support-2024-02-16/Humeyra Pamuk世界美国
Cuba struggles to shore up subsidized milk supply for childrenCuba is struggling to secure enough milk for children, a minister said, in the latest shortage putting strain on a decades-old subsidies scheme created by the late Fidel Castro. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:24:44 GMT N6SRZ3YWOJIGHLLLBYS526MBAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-struggles-shore-up-subsidized-milk-supply-children-2024-02-16/Reuters世界美洲
Nikki Haley blasts Trump for relationship with Putin after Navalny's deathRepublican presidential contender Nikki Haley slammed Donald Trump on Friday for maintaining an amiable relationship with Vladimir Putin, after the Russian president's most formidable opponent, Alexei Navalny, died in a prison colony on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 16:16:35 GMT KMUEYOIFRRK3HEL6BXM6ARTZBY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/nikki-haley-blasts-trump-relationship-with-putin-after-navalnys-death-2024-02-16/Gram Slattery世界美国
Ivory Coast seizes 100 tons of cocoa at the border with GuineaIvory Coast's Coffee and Cocoa Council (CCC) has helped the national police to seize three trucks loaded with 1,500 bags of cocoa beans on the border with Guinea, the regulator's managing director said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:56:27 GMT MAAUQCC6BNLT7O2R2JMFJOFS4U https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ivory-coast-seizes-100-tons-cocoa-border-with-guinea-2024-02-16/Reuters世界非洲
Tobago's tourism, fishing hit as oil slick spreads across CaribbeanNine days after a slick was first spotted by Trinidad and Tobago's Coast Guard, an oil leak from a capsized barge remains unplugged, according to first responders and authorities, raising alarms for nations across the Caribbean Sea. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:56:02 GMT 54JOCZ4ACJMYDEZ65ASLA6UMXI https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/tobagos-tourism-fishing-hit-oil-slick-spreads-across-caribbean-2024-02-16/Curtis Williams可持续发展气候与能源
Russian prosecutors warn citizens against mass rally in Moscow after Navalny's deathThe Russian prosecutor's office has warned Russians against participating in a mass protest in the centre of Moscow after the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:49:35 GMT NUEQZQ3RQFNQFMD2PMCBI5SKNM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-prosecutors-warn-citizens-against-mass-rally-moscow-after-navalnys-death-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
US sanctions against Houthis over Red Sea attacks take effectU.S. "Specially Designated Global Terrorist" sanctions against Houthis for their ties to attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea took effect on Friday, the U.S. Department of Treasury said in a statement on its website. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:31:00 GMT F5FVKMUQXVINFG46GHAZGPYGAM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-sanctions-against-houthis-over-red-sea-attacks-take-effect-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Hamas says Israeli hostages have suffered many lossesHamas' armed wing said on Friday that Israelis taken hostage by the militants on Oct. 7 had suffered many losses and that those that were alive were living in extremely difficult conditions. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:29:39 GMT 32FQ725F4FMQBOIWXPLF3XQQQI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-says-losses-amongst-israeli-hostages-are-many-remaining-live-difficult-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东
French journalist says India is forcing her to leaveA French national, who says she has worked as a journalist in India for more than two decades and is married to an Indian man, said on Friday a notice from New Delhi accusing her of writing articles damaging to the state meant she would have to leave. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 15:25:09 GMT TVQXBNMVGZI6TGRV6ITVX557K4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/french-journalist-says-india-is-forcing-her-leave-2024-02-16/Reuters世界印度
